State of New York.
County of Kings. } SS.
City of Brooklyn.

Julius R. Pomeroy of said city County and State, appointed a Commissioner of Deeds by the Executive of the State of Kentucky by Commission bearing date March 28th 1861, being duly sworn, says that he will well and truly execute and perform all the duties of his station, as such Commissioner of Deeds.
Subscribed by the said Julius R. Pomeroy and sworn to by him before me this third day of April A. D. 1861 -- itness my hand and notarial seal of office.
